pr_title: improvement of the article "How to Return Multiple Values From a Java…

timeline.bodyText: When continuing a line, we use a two space indent
timeline.author: eric-martin

replies.bodyText:
fixed all continuation indents, such as long method signatures.
It seems that my IDE (intellij) dosn't think the fluent function calls starting with dot as continuations. Should I make them have indent 2 anyway? (Personally I think the current format is easier to read)
replies.author: sk1418

replies.bodyText: Yes ... two space indentation for line continuations. If we don't fix it now, we will have to fix it later :)
replies.author: eric-martin

replies.bodyText:
Ok. thanks.
I fixed the indentation.
replies.author: sk1418
